lines.text: Who says I'm too drunk to fight? Stand up and I'll show ya!
Hey, Cisco, wait a minute! What about the gold mine?
The gold of the rising sun is much more beautiful, senorita. And it is ours for as long as we live.
Amigo, if the young lady refuses to say, "I do," shoot the gentleman in the leg.
And if the gentleman refuses to say, "I do," shoot him in the other leg. It only comes twice in the ceremony, no?
Excuse me, sir. Could you tell me where the schoolhouse is?
Surest thing. Up the street about two blocks... where it says Dead Eye Saloon.
What? The Dead Eye Saloon is a schoolhouse?
Yep. The owner got killed so we moved the kids in there.
